Summary: blurry, distanced, circular, red, orange, pink lights
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside with my daughter because she told me to look up at the sky after we went outside. She showed me the UFO by the lake that is a few blocks away from us, the UFO hovered a few inches away from the lake and hovered for 30 minutes and twenty five minutes into seeing the UFO we were watching it fly away and 5 minutes later it was gone.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Glen Allen
There were no other sightings in Glen Allen on or around March 17th 2012
